name: Nomadix Do Anything Towel - Unisex
description:
Name the activity and the Do Anything Towel has got you covered. Fast drying, durable and packs down small for travel.Slip resistant material is great for yoga.Anti-microbial helps keep the funk to a minimum.Tight weave sheds sand and dirt.Light and compact when packed.40cm x 100cm.

        Sustainability
